name: Hero Alpha 0.6.2 (DEMO)
description:
Hello everybody this is my game Hero, a 2D platformer about a boy who goes on a journey to save his planet, Harquene. This is the second Demo I have released on this dream game project of mine. It fixes a lot of issues encountered in the original demo as well as expanding gameplay. I hope you enjoy!

-Indie Dev Dylan.

CONTROLLS(Keyboard and Mouse, Dualshock, Xbox One, and Switch Pro):

A/D or Left Stick Left and Right -  To move Left and Right

W or Up on Left Stick- Climb Up

S or Down on Left Stick - Climb Down or Crawl

SPACE or Button Action Button (i.e. 'x' for PlayStation) - Jump/Swim

SHIFT or Left Action Button (i.e. 'Square' for PlayStation)- Run

ESCAPE or Pause Button - Pause

RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON or Left Trigger - Aim

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON or Right Trigger - Shoot
